scripts.pre-commit-ui: cd admin.theverbal.co && npm run lint-fix && cd ..
scripts.pre-commit-api: cd admin-api.theverbal.co && npm run lint-fix && cd ..
scripts.pre-push-ui: cd admin.theverbal.co && npm run lint && CI=true npm run test -- --passWithNoTests && cd ..
scripts.pre-push-api: cd admin-api.theverbal.co && npm run lint && CI=true npm run test -- --passWithNoTests && cd ..

hooks.pre-commit: npm run pre-commit-ui && npm run pre-commit-api && npx -p prettier@latest -p pretty-quick pretty-quick --staged
